title: Short Answer Questions
instructions: Provide detailed answers to the following questions.

questions.prompt: Describe Emergent Gameplay. Provide an example.
Describe negative and positive feedback loops. Give one an example for each.
Pick a genre. Discuss design principles in that genre and give an example of a game using those principles.
List two indicators of poor game design. Explain why they are indicators of poor design and give video game examples that demonstrate these.
Choose one of the trade offs in game design we discussed. Explain what it means and use a video game example to elaborate on this point.
